name: M.A.S.K
description:
M.A.S.K is a Mega Atomic Scary Killer. You must kill 4 opponents in a huge manor. Investigate to find your ennemies fear. Then, wear frightening masks, and become thoses fears...

Controls:

Z,Q,S,D <-- Player's displacement
I <-- Notes' Inventory (Use arrows to navigate)
M <-- Masks' Inventory (Use arrows to navigate. Equip by pressing Right Arrow)
C <-- Map
Space <-- Back (in Menus)

Goal:

4 strange men live in the mansion next to yours. Those stranges guys can walk on their heads. So creepy!
Learn about their fear by finding notes dispatch everywhere in the mansion. Then, wear the mask and impresonate their fear to kill them.
Don't get cought. Hide under carpet and Wait the right moment to surprise them.

Made by:

Samuel AMAR
Henri DABERE
Tarik HOFMAN
Alexis LEGOFF
Nicolas QUEAU

as part of the Pix'art Jam, organized by ISART DIGITAL
